falsificationAttempts.targetDescription: Lab supervisor automatically stays in sync with server policies
falsificationQueries: compare lab run_policy.ts to server run policy storage/enforcement
falsificationAttempts.falsificationAnalysis: Lab uses a local RUN_POLICY constant; server enforces the run's persisted policy. Synchronization is manual. README should clarify that lab config must be kept aligned with run policies to avoid policy_denied failures.
